QuestData.Title: Skin of the Saurok
QuestData.Description: Ihgaluk Crag is a dangerous place. Luckily, you have the magic of the Kirin Tor behind you.$b$bI can transform you into a saurok.$b$bI will perform the first half of the illusion on you now. Afterwards, you should go directly to Ihgaluk Crag and slay one of the Skumblade saurok. Once you have done this, I will contact you and complete the second half of the illusion.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: I will transform you to look like a saurok.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Ihgaluk Crag and slay a Skumblade saurok.
QuestData.RewardText: <The voice of Archmage Vargoth echoes in your mind.>$b$bIs it done yet? Ah, good.$b$bI can complete the second half of the enchantment now. You will soon see your disguise appear. As long as you stay out of combat, the saurok should see you as one of their own.$b$bGood luck!
